---
title: Supplements MCMC Diagnostic Tables
format: docx
---

All diagnostics presented here are for default priors.

# Presende model

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

library(tibble)
library(gt)
library(here)
library(dplyr)

presence_diag <- read.csv(here("results/chains/diagnostics_count.csv"))
presence_diag %>%
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), \(x) round(x, 3))) %>%
    gt()
```

# Count model

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

count_diag <- read.csv(here("results/chains/diagnostics_presence.csv"))
count_diag %>%
    mutate(across(where(is.numeric), \(x) round(x, 3))) %>%
    gt()
```
